CREATE DATABASE epharma;

CREATE TABLE Clients
(
    "idCliente" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 200000 CACHE 1 ),
    nome character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "cpfCnpj" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    rg character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "dtNascimento" date,
    telefone character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    email character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "dtCadastro" date,
    CONSTRAINT "Clients_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("idCliente")
)

Create Table Plans
(
idPlan int identity(1,1),
plan nvarchar(50),
dtInicioVigencia datetime,
dtFinalVigencia datetime,
permitePessoaJuridica nvarchar(1),
dtCadastro datetime
)

Create Table ClientPlan
idCliPlan int identity(1,1),
idCliente int,
idPlan int
